temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: The _Land_ flight mode causes the vehicle to land at the position where the mode was engaged.
The vehicle will disarm shortly after landing (by default).
1.Mode is automatic - no user intervention is _required_ to control the vehicle.
2.Mode requires at least a valid local position estimate (does not require a global position).
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( eModerquires >= avalilositiostinetmate < requirer ) -> not ( equirealoblosi == lpositiosioioion ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Flying vehicles can't switch to this mode without valid local position.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( not ( lFyingvehiclescan == swilocal ) and valilpocalp == sitiositono )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Flying vehicles will failsafe if they lose the position estimate.
3.Mode prevents arming (vehicle must be armed when switching to this mode).
5.RC stick movement in a multicopter (or VTOL in multicopter mode) will by default change the vehicle to Position mode unless handling a critical battery failsafe.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( RCstickmovemetn == amulticoper or rise ( VTOLmultefaulticle == Psoitinule ) -> rise ( ulonuleshadtnlica == gricatlicalerite ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 6.The mode can be triggered using the MAV_CMD_NAV_LAND MAVLink command, or by explicitly switching to Land mode.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( cantrigerdgedusing == MAV_CMD_NAV_L == NLxcomnd ) or byexplicitlyswitlin == ichingLatcithingLa )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: The vehicle will land at the location at which the mode was engaged.
The vehicle descends at the rate specified in MPC_LAND_SPEED and will disarm after landing (by default).
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( vehicledscends == ratespecified and ( MPC_LAND_SED == disarmlandingbydefaul ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: RC stick movement will change the vehicle to Position mode (by default).
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( rise ( RCstickmovement == vePositioioin > 6 and bydefaultn < bydefault ) )
